summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingThe AvÃ¨ne Cleanance Cleansing Gel is a biodegradable, daily cleanser for face & body, which helps remove impurities & reduce excess oil while respecting sensitive skins delicate balance. Leaves skin feeling refreshed, clear & matte for up to 6 hours without stripping skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsBiodegradable, daily cleanser for blemish-prone face & body is safe for adolescents and adultsDeeply cleanses and visibly clears pores while respecting sensitive skinSafe for adolescents and adults for face and bodyExcellent toleranceKey IngredientsComedoclastin, a stabilized extract derived from Milk Thistle, helps visibly reduces appearance of blemishesZinc Gluconate soothesGentle surfactants cleanse while respecting sensitive skinAvÃ¨ne Thermal Spring Water, clinically shown by 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm skinFormulated WithoutParabensAHA/BHAItem 2586859How To UseApply morning and/or evening to damp skin, work up a lather, rinse well then dry.IngredientsAvene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua), Water (Aqua), Zinc Coceth Sulphate, Lauryl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Ceteareth-60 Myristyl Glycol, Peg-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Polysorbate 20, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Perfume), Green 5 (Ci 61570), Isopropyl Alcohol, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Peg-6, Ppg-26-Buteth-26, Silybum Marianum Fruit Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Zinc Gluconate.
how_to_use: Apply morning and/or evening to damp skin, work up a lather, rinse well then dry.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I really enjoy this cleanser.

reviews.headline: THE BEST!!!!
reviews.comments: If i could rate this cleanser 100 stars I WOULD! I tried everything and none came close to how affective at removing dirt, oil and sunscreen as this cleanser. Thank you AvÃ¨ne!!!

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: It's the best for me I have been using it for sometime now

reviews.headline: Took one day
reviews.comments: I bought this for my boyfriend, he has a bit rough/ combo skin. He has oily parts on the side of his face and around the upper cheeks. When using it, the pimples reduced its size, didnt strip his natural oils, looked smooth and hydrating! We also used it on his back and all the pimples were ready to be popped off. We love it. I also tried it and my skin is clear, supper sensitive w/ roseca, my skin felt soo clean! We used the hydrating rich cream from avene and it was amazing!

reviews.headline: Great for those with oilier, acne-prone skin.
reviews.comments: Little/ no irritation, the smell might be too strong for some, but is a refreshing, clean scent. Bought this while abroad and pleased to see that Ulta carries it!

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: Works great on my rosacea does not turn my face red or cause irritation.

reviews.headline: Great product, poor packaging
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser SO MUCH but every time I use it, I have to squeeze the bottle so tight for any product to come out and when it does, it's a lot more product than I need. I'm not sure if I got a defective bottle but the packaging cap is horrible. I wouldn't buy the 6 oz bottle again simply because of the packaging.

reviews.headline: I'm loving him.
reviews.comments: I'm liking it I've used other brands like La Roche and cerave, but this soap is spectacular leaves my skin soft without fat I love...

reviews.headline: Prefect cleanser for my night-time routine!
reviews.comments:
This cleanser isn't going to work for you if you don't already have a skincare routine. Ex: Cleansing, toning, and moisturizing. If you are not doing all the steps and think this is going to work, you'd be wrong. It would dry out your skin and leave you tight and eventually flakey. 
If you have a full routine, this cleanser is by far my #1 choice. It has literally changed the texture of my face. I am smooth, so smooth in fact I don't even recognize myself sometimes. I got this in a trial freebie pack, and I had results in one application. I immediately bought a larger size and it is a staple in my routine now. I highly recommend if you have a full routine and your cleanser isn't giving you smooth skin. Especially if you have oily skin with acne. 10/10!!

reviews.headline: The holy grail of my skin care routine!
reviews.comments: I ride or die with this product! I've been using it for years now, and it helps manage the excessive oils on my face that cause acne. Full transparancy, I also use a topical acne medicine from my dermatologist and take birth control to help control my acne. I'm an athlete, and my skin was breaking out after long workouts when my skin was covered in excessive sweat and oils for long periods. This product helps manage that. I have perfectly clear skin now! For real a game changer for controlling oil.

reviews.headline: Like washing your face with perfume
reviews.comments: Received as a sample. I'm not sensitive to fragrance but can't get past how heavily perfumed this product is. Combo skin - did fine as a cleanser but nothing special. It mostly felt like washing my face with a gentle hand soap. There's way better out there.

reviews.headline: It s very good product
reviews.comments: I used it many years ago

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: Love how this product leaves my skin so clean an soft.

reviews.headline: Great face wash
reviews.comments: I dont have a problem with the smell. I actually feel like it smells very clean. I do feel it is very drying though. I do have dry skin which this probably isnt the best face wash for me but has made me feel like it cleans my face really good. Great face wash but ive tried better.

reviews.headline: Nice Face Cleaner
reviews.comments: I am a huge fan of their rich face cream so I thought I would give this face wash a try. It has kind of a weird smell, almost like hair dye? Peoole keep saying that it is very drying, but I personally have not had that issue. It has kept my face nice and clean. I do think I would purchase again.

reviews.headline: Nice Face Cleaner

Peoole keep saying that it is very drying, but I personally have not had that issue. It has kept my face nice and clean. I do think I would purchase again.

reviews.headline: best cleanser I have ever used
reviews.comments: If you have oily skin this is the product for you

reviews.headline: Smells disgusting
reviews.comments: I just couldn't get past the smell.. I found it extremely unpleasant, so much so that I had to wash my face with something else after using the cleanser. Therefore I can't really vouch for the effects of the product. As another reviewer mentioned, I felt like I could taste it, so I had to rinse out my mouth as well. It legitimately reminded me of toilet bowl cleaner. I'll have to throw it out.

reviews.headline: Meh.
reviews.comments: I really like this cleanser for removing makeup (which I rarely wear) but it's sooooo drying! It will strip your skin of everything! I wouldn't recommend for daily usage.

faceoff_positive.comments:
I received a trial size of AvÃ¨ne Cleanance Cleansing Gel from BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review. I've currently replaced my normal cleanser with this one for the past week, and I've really enjoyed it.

I've found that AvÃ¨ne Cleanance Cleansing Gel has a wonderful consistency, it is in fact a gel as it says, but this has been enjoyable for me due to switching from a more liquid based cleanser. I find that I lose less product when trying to lather and I find it easier to get the correct amount.

A little bit of this goes a long way, I use about a pea sized amount for my entire face and neck. The gel creates a full lather that has a wonderful feel to it. It goes on easily and rinses clean without any film or greasy feeling left behind, which makes it a bit quicker to use compared to some other products.

The scent is enjoyable and light, not overwhelming. As someone with oily, acne prone skin, this works really well for me as it's a bit drying, but not so much that my face feels parched after use, just enough to cleanly wash the oil from my skin, while still remaining soft. It leaves your skin with a bit of a matte finish to it, which for me creates a perfect base for moisturizer and night time skincare routines, or is a fantastic base to apply makeup. It's also good for sensitive skin as sometimes cleansers are irritating to me or cause redness after use. I've noticed it's been beneficial in helping to clear a few acne spots I currently have just within a week of use, and I notice my face is less oily the morning after using it. All in all it's a great addition to a skincare routine for anyone whose skin might fit these parameters.
faceoff_positive.headline: Effective and gentle cleanser

faceoff_negative.comments: I received this as a sample to try. I love the gel consistency of this cleanser. It lathers a little bit but not much. It seems to break down my makeup well which is great. The downside to this product, from my perspective, is the heavy fragrance. I don't mind a little fragrance but this is intense and overpowering. I first tested it on the inside of my arm because I have really sensitive skin and I need to test a product before putting it on my face. Just trying it on my arm the fragrance was overpowering, so much so that I could actually taste it in my mouth. I didn't get a rash on my arm I assumed it would be safe to use on my face. It removed my makeup, but naturally, I could taste the product even without it getting in my mouth just because of how scented it is. It was as if I had eaten soap - not pleasant. Because of the strong scent, and a slight sticky feeling on my skin after using it, I didn't feel clean. It felt like I still had cleanser on my face and a ton of chemicals. I also noticed some redness and a little bit of itchiness after using. If you have sensitive skin or are sensitive to fragrance I suggest steering clear of this. I do have sensitive skin but I'm not sensitive to fragrance yet this was horrible.
faceoff_negative.headline: fragrance is too strong
